fotoshop.GUI.SequencePanel

Class SequenceConstructorPanel.TextField_Change

  • java.lang.Object
    • fotoshop.GUI.SequencePanel.SequenceConstructorPanel.TextField_Change
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.beans.PropertyChangeListener, java.util.EventListener
    Enclosing class:
    SequenceConstructorPanel

    public class SequenceConstructorPanel.TextField_Change
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.beans.PropertyChangeListener
    Listener for the Text fields used by the constructor panel. Any change in text attempts to update the textfields entry and messageList index
